mechanics.outcome: Creature gains a '+10' bonus to Dexterity (Stealth) checks

mechanics.condition: Creature is chosen by caster within 30 feet of them and affected by Pass Without Trace AND tracking method is NOT magical
Creature is chosen by caster within 30 feet of them and affected by Pass Without Trace
mechanics.outcome: Creature leaves behind no tracks or other traces of its passage

description_text: A veil of shadows and silence radiates from you, masking you and your companions from detection. For the duration, each creature you choose within 30 feet of you (including you) has a +10 bonus to Dexterity (Stealth) checks and can't be tracked except by magical means. A creature that receives this bonus leaves behind no tracks or other traces of its passage.
